all.title: shadertoy.js basic demo
all.info: If you're into WebGL and GLSL, by now you should have heard of ShaderToy. This is a copy of their fragment shader example. Running on a small WebGL library I've build to emulate it. Why?... Why now?!

all.title: Trippy Stripes
all.info: Experimenting with uv offsets on a noise texture.

all.title: Vanish in smoke
all.info: This was a quick test for a text transition using a noise texture.

all.title: Candy Crush
all.info: This was the result of two problems I tried to fix for a commercial project. First, I'm drawing a gradient with 4 distinct colours, and secondly I'm adding another gradient with transparency and variable height on top of it.

all.title: Flat Ocean
all.info: Flat Ocean is a study on THREE.ShaderMaterial. It includes fog, lights and uses standard derivatives to calculate per face lighting (kind of).

all.title: Mountain Generator
all.info: Mountain generator is another study on THREE.ShaderMaterial.
